channel.title: How do i make specials appear?
channel.description: I can't make that "S P E C I A L A T T A C K" bar show up on the bottom for some weapons and I want to know how i can make it appear there :confused:

item.title: How do i make specials appear?
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

I am guessing some items don’t support it?

Well, I am not really sure as of this moment, I’ll try and find out.

I am trying to get the Special bar go away for some items :).

But, anyways. Good luck finding it, I’ll be looking too!

  • Matt.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make specials appear?
